subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Brazil defeated Ireland, 1-0, in an exhibition in Dublin.Robinho scored the deciding goal in the 66th minute when he sidefooted a ball through the legs of Lee Carsley and past Ireland’s diving goalkeeper, Shay Given.Ireland had a chance to tie the game in the 88th minute, but after a series of quick passes inside the box and a deft flick by Kevin Kilbane, Robbie Keane could not get a touch before Julio César smothered the ball.
